=== CONFIG_CPU_FREQ_DEFAULT_GOV_PERFORMANCE ===

Somewhat counter intuitively the kernel default performance governer us Performance.  This is that boot time is measurably faster with this governer.  Although this is the default, early userspace switches us to the users chosen governer defaulting to OnDemand.
